title: Ticket #338: Fix Green Computing on Linux
description: Just a ticket to help track any problems with GC on Linux.
remarks:
2009-Mar-20 22:44:51 by tannenba:
Are there currently known problems w/ green computing features specific to linux? If not, this ticket should go away....

2009-Mar-23 14:17:37 by burnett:
That waits to be seen. We have a user testing each iteration of the changes Nick makes, so there may be more to report: either here, or on a child ticket.
creator: burnett
